imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Colorful kids-themed app logo with a friendly star or book illustration and bold playful text 'KidsLearn', suitable for both header and splash screen use (kidslearn-logo.dim_256x256.png)

existing_features.title: Add the KidsLearn app logo prominently on the Home page (frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx) and in the sticky Header component (frontend/src/components/layout/Header.tsx). The logo should be a fun, colorful kids-themed SVG or PNG rendered as a visible brand mark alongside the app name. Place it at the top-center of the Home page hero area and as an inline element in the header next to the app title.

Increase the font sizes for all primary text, headings, numbers, and labels throughout the app. This includes: number cards in NumbersLesson, Numbers100Lesson; alphabet cards in AlphabetLesson and AlphabetFullScreen; quiz question and answer text in Quiz and TimedChallenge; lesson body text in Lessons; vocabulary and picture card labels in VocabularyLesson and PictureLesson; and dashboard stat numbers in KidsDashboard and ProgressWidget. Bump base text sizes up at least one Tailwind size step (e.g. text-lg → text-xl, text-2xl → text-3xl) and heading/number display sizes by at least two steps.

Increase the size of images, emoji illustrations, and card thumbnails across the app. This includes: emoji/image displays in AlphabetLesson, AlphabetFullScreen, PictureLesson, VocabularyLesson, NumbersLesson, GameCard, LearningCard, and MiniGame. Increase image/emoji container sizes by at least 25–40% compared to current sizing, using larger Tailwind size classes (e.g. w-16 h-16 → w-24 h-24, text-4xl emoji → text-6xl).

new_feature_requests.summary: Increase the size of words, numbers and images throughout the app
